page.title: 12DAWN SOUTER'S DAY
page.content:
I GOT UP AT 6.40 AND HAD SOME TOAST AND A CUP OF COFFEE FOR MY BREAKFAST. THEN I HELPED MY MAM PREPARE THE BUFFET FOR MY BROTHERS CHRISTENING.
WHEN IT WAS READY I WENT TO GET DRESSED.NANA AND GRANDA CAME AND BROUGHT SOME FLANS AND TRIFLES. THEN WE WENT TO ST.MICHAEL'S CHURCH.
WHEN THE SERVICE WAS OVER WE WENT HOME AND HAD OUR FOOD.PHILIP GOT LOTS OF PRESENTS.
WHEN EVERYBODY HAD GONE HOME MY FRIEND CAME TO PLAY WITH ME.WE PLAYED BADMINTON AND LOOKED AT OUR STAMPS.WHEN IT GOT LATE I HAD A BOWL OF CORNFLAKES FOR MY SUPPER. THEN I WENT TO BED
